thread.title: FIFA Fines Hong Kong for Football Fans Booing the Chinese National Anthem
thread.title_full: FIFA Fines Hong Kong for Football Fans Booing the Chinese National Anthem

title: FIFA Fines Hong Kong for Football Fans Booing the Chinese National Anthem
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
7 Oct 2015 07:37 AM EST 
The international body that governs association football has fined the Hong Kong Football Association (HKFA) HK$40,000 (US$5,161) for Hong Kong fans jeering at the Chinese national anthem â€” which Hong Kong shares with the mainland. The Chinese national anthem, "March of the Volunteers," has been shared by Hong Kong since 1997 when it was returned to China by the British. Many comments on the news on Chinese social network Weibo were critical of Hong Kong. A user said (link in Chinese) it was time to "liberate" Hong Kong from China, and another said China should send Hong Kong back to the British.
